name: Quota
description:
Ever wanted to be stuck in an endless loop of paperwork, making your way through a seemingly never-ending workload?

Then this is the game for you!

Make sure you type out your notes with excellent grammatical accuracy - otherwise you won't be able to go home for the day. Then get ready to start all over again but with even more copies required!

How many days will you make it through?

Created for Ludum Dare 47
